name: Alien Burger Maker
description:
Alien Burger Maker, is an energetic, fast-paced experience. You are a chef in an alien restaurant, making odd and unique burgers for your alien customers. Little do they know what's about to happen at the end of your shift. 

Note:

The Android build was designed for the Oculus GO. The PC build was designed for the Oculus Rift. Problems may occur if you are trying to run the game on different hardware.

If you want to check out our blog sites, you can check out Daniel Buckley's blog site at https://www.daniel-buckley.com/, and Nam Ha's blog site on namhablog.wordpress.com.
